debtors.roadNumber: Road number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)
debtors.roadSubNumber: Road sub number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)
telephones: optional array of telephone numbers up to 3
cellphones: optional array of cellphone numbers up to 3
debtors.emailsOrReason: An array of 1-3 emails or a string containing a single reason for no email
debtors.hasMultipleDebtCollectionProcedures: boolean (¿En contra de usted se han iniciado dos (2) o más procedimientos públicos o privados de cobro de obligaciones dinerarias, de ejecución especial o de restitución de bienes por mora en el pago de cánones?)
debtors.employmentOrIncomeCertificationFilePath: Path to employment or income certification file
debtors.totalMonthlyIncomeFromOtherActivities: Total monthly income from other activities in COP
debtors.totalMonthlyIncomeFromOtherActivitiesDes: Description of total monthly income from other activities

spouse.firstName: First name (Spouse is optional. If set, publicDeedOrJudgmentFilePath and assetsListFilePath will be ignore.)

debtors.publicDeedOrJudgmentFilePath: Path to public deed or judgment file if has Partnership Dissolved Within Last Two Years (optional)
debtors.assetsListFilePath: Path to assets list file if has Partnership Dissolved Within Last Two Years (optional)
debtors.schoolLevel: (optional: 'DOCTORADO O EQUIVALENTE', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA PRIMARIA', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA SECUNDARIA O SECUNDARIA BAJA', 'EDUCACIÓN DE LA PRIMERA INFANCIA', 'EDUCACIÓN MEDIA O SECUNDARIA ALTA', 'EDUCACIÓN POSTSECUNDARIA NO SUPERIOR', 'EDUCACIÓN TÉCNICA PROFESIONAL Y TECNOLÓGICA', 'ESPECIALIZACIÓN, MAESTRÍA O EQUIVALENTE', 'NINGUNA', 'NO INFORMA', 'UNIVERSITARIO O EQUIVALENTE')

professions.name: Profession name (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'ABARROTERO', 'ABOGADO', etc)
professions.institution: Institution (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'CENTRO DE EDUCACION MILITAR - CEMIL', 'CENTRO EDUCACIONAL DE COMPUTOS Y SISTEMAS-CEDESISTEMAS-', etc.)
